name: Galactic Super Justice Team
description:
I started this project around Dec 10th, this demo is more of a proof of concept to myself that I could cobble together the parts needed to make an interactive networked multiplayer experience.

The project vision is to add a second and third phase such that a full game will take about 25 minutes and will hopefully capture some of the fun of shows like Power Rangers and Voltron.

If you have any trouble connecting for multiplayer, check your router settings and add port forwarding for port 25565 for UDP or BOTH if you have the option. If you've ever hosted a minecraft server you probably already have done this.
